tradestock.model.tradeoperation

Interface TradeOperation<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockModel, TradeModel

    public interface TradeOperation<K>
    This interface represent a TradeOperation. A TradeOperation model could create portfolio, but stocks, get cost, get value, get portfolio list, get portfolio state, add empty stock, create strategy, apply strategy, save and read strategy.

        stockSymbol - given stock symbol

               java.time.LocalDate date,
               double money)

        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        stockSymbol - given stock symbol
        date - given date
        money - given money

                               java.time.LocalDate date)

        date - given date
        Returns:

      • savePortfolio

        void savePortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                   java.lang.String fileName)
        Save a portfolio into a XML file by given portfolio name and file name. If the file name already exists, this method will overwrite the file.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        fileName - given save file name

      • readPortfolio

        void readPortfolio(java.lang.String fileName)
        Read a XML file to get a portfolio. If the file dose not exist, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException. The format of file must be as follows:
        <portfolio>
        <portfolio-name>p1</portfolio-name>
        <stock>
        <stock-symbol>MSFT</stock-symbol>
        <transaction-history>
        <date>2019-03-11</date>
        <sell>false</sell>
        <volume>36.0</volume>
        <cost>100.0</cost>
        </transaction-history>
        ...
        </stock>
        ...
        </portfolio>
        All the tags must be lower case. All content must in root tag portfolio. User cannot change order of tags. A portfolio can have one or more stocks, and a stock can have one or more transaction-history. Format of date must be yyyy-mm-dd. Sell must be true or false. If portfolio name already exists, the method will overwrite portfolio in map.
        Parameters:
        fileName - given file name

      • createStrategyNoEndEqualPercent

        void createStrategyNoEndEqualPercent(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> stockList,
                                     double money,
                                     java.time.LocalDate beginDate,
                                     int day)
        Create a strategy with equal percent and without end date. If stocks are duplicate or begin date is in the future, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        name - strategy name
        stockList - stock list
        money - total money
        beginDate - begin date
        day - days between two but operation

      • createStrategyNoEndDiffPercent

                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> stockList,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weight,
                                    double money,
                                    java.time.LocalDate beginDate,
                                    int day)
        Create a strategy with without end date. If stocks are duplicate or begin date is in the future, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        name - strategy name
        stockList - stock list
        weight - weight list
        money - total money
        beginDate - begin date
        day - days between two but operation

      • createStrategyEqualPercent

        void createStrategyEqualPercent(java.lang.String name,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> stockList,
                                double money,
                                java.time.LocalDate beginDate,
                                java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                int day)
        Create a strategy with equal percent and with end date. If stocks are duplicate or begin date is in the future, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException. End date will be the last date to buy stocks.
        Parameters:
        name - strategy name
        stockList - stock list
        money - total money
        beginDate - begin date
        endDate - end date
        day - days between two but operation

      • createStrategyDiffPercent

        void createStrategyDiffPercent(java.lang.String name,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> stockList,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weight,
                               double money,
                               java.time.LocalDate beginDate,
                               java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                               int day)
        Create a strategy with with end date. If stocks are duplicate or begin date is in the future, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException. End date will be the last date to buy stocks.
        Parameters:
        name - strategy name
        stockList - stock list
        weight - weight list
        money - total money
        beginDate - begin date
        endDate - end date
        day - days between two but operation
